dcterms:creator: Barry Becker
Ronny Kohavi
dcterms:description: The Adult dataset is derived from the US Census of 1994 and contains demographic information of 48,842 individuals. It is commonly used in fairness-aware machine learning benchmarks, where the associated prediction task is to predict whether an individual earns more or less than $50,000 per year.
dcterms:title: Adult Dataset
